mapper.insert: insert into qna (qna_category_id, qna_title, qna_content, user_id, qna_private_yn) values (#{category.id}, #{title}, #{content}, #{user.id}, #{privateYn})
mapper.select: select qna_id as id, c.qna_category_id as "category.id", c.qna_category_name as "category.name", qna_title as title, u.user_id as "user.id", user_nickname as "user.nickname", qna_private_yn as privateYn, qna_create_date as createDate, qna_update_date as updateDate, qna_delete_yn as deleteYn, qna_answer_yn as answerYn, q.product_id as "product.id", p.product_name as "product.name" from qna q left join qna_category c on q.qna_category_id = c.qna_category_id left join user u on q.user_id = u.user_id left join product p on q.product_id = p.product_id where q.qna_answer_yn = 'N' and qna_delete_yn = 'N' order by qna_id desc

select qna_id as id, q.qna_category_id as "category.id", c.qna_category_name as "category.name", qna_title as title, qna_content as content, q.user_id as "user.id", u.user_nickname as "user.nickname", u.user_email as "user.email", qna_private_yn as "privateYn", qna_create_date as createDate, qna_update_date as updateDate, qna_delete_yn as deleteYn, qna_answer_writer as "answerWriter.id", qna_answer as answer, qna_answer_yn as answerYn, q.product_id as "product.id", p.product_name as "product.name" from qna q left join qna_category c on q.qna_category_id = c.qna_category_id left join user u on q.user_id = u.user_id left join product p on q.product_id = p.product_id where qna_id = #{id} and qna_delete_yn = 'N' order by qna_id desc
